    • Method Detail

      • addBase

        public PartslistModel addBase(OrderModel order)
                       throws DataException
        Used to get a Partslist with materials for the base construction. This method creates a Partslist with all the materials needed in the base construction based on the details in the given order.
        Parameters:
        order - Contains the dimensions needed to create the base
        Returns:
        PartslistModel
        Throws:
        DataException

      • calcMaterials

        protected void calcMaterials(PartslistModel bom,
                             int carportLength,
                             int carportWidth,
                             int shedLength,
                             int shedWidth,
                             boolean heavyRoof,
                             DataFacade db)
                      throws DataException
        Used by addBase() to add the needed materials to the Partslist. This method gets materials from the DB and modifies the given Partslist by adding the materials.
        Parameters:
        bom - PartslistModel
        carportLength - int: Length of carport
        carportWidth - int: Width of carport
        shedLength - int: Length of shed
        shedWidth - int: Width of shed
        heavyRoof - boolean: Whether or not the roof incline is 0 or above 0 degrees
        db - DataFacade
        Throws:
        DataException

      • calcPosts

        protected int calcPosts(int carportLength,
                        int carportWidth,
                        int shedLength,
                        int shedWidth,
                        int postDistance)
        Used by calcMaterials() to calculate the amount of Posts needed. This method calculates the amount of posts needed for the base construction.
        Parameters:
        carportLength - int: Length of carport
        carportWidth - int: Width of carport
        shedLength - int: Length of shed
        shedWidth - int: Width of shed
        postDistance - int: Maximum allowed distance between posts
        Returns:
        int: The amount of posts needed

      • calcStraps

        protected int calcStraps(int carportLength,
                         int carportWidth,
                         MaterialModel strap)
        Used by calcMaterials() to calculate the amount of Straps needed. This method calculates the amount of straps needed for the base construction. This method also counts the amount of times a strap has been split (this value is used by calcBolts())
        Parameters:
        carportLength - int: Length of carport
        carportWidth - int: Width of carport
        strap - MaterialModel
        Returns:
        int: The amount of straps needed

      • calcBolts

        protected int calcBolts(int strapAmount)
        Used by calcMaterials() to calculate the amount of Bolts needed.
        Parameters:
        strapAmount - int: Amount of straps needed for the base construction
        Returns:
        int: The amount of bolts needed
